Package ivory.index

Provides classes for building inverted indexes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BuildIntPostingsForwardIndex  
BuildIPInvertedIndexDocSorted Indexer for building document-sorted inverted indexes.
DistributeGlobalStatsToPostings  
IntTermDocno A Hadoop WritableComparable that represents a term and a document that contains that term.
IntTermDocno.Comparator Comparator optimized for IntTermDocno.
MergeGlobalStatsAcrossIndexSegments  
MergePostings  
TermOccurrences  
TermPositions A Hadoop Writable that encodes the position of term occurrences within a document.
